p: In this study, an ultrasound generator with a maximum power of 400 W and a frequency of 20 Â± 0.5 kHz (Ultrasonic Technology Development Company, Iran) was used. The choice microwave oven was a domestic type (2450 MHz, 800 W, Samsung) with the volume of 2 L. The unpasteurized samples of rose water were purchased from Kaaba Company, Iran. Figure 1 shows a scheme of the pasteurization system.
